Package at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConnectionControl
    IConnectionControl provides methods to allow or disallow linking of certain devices as well as obtain CarInformations of all registered cars.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CarConnectionAcceptor
    A CarConnectionAcceptor listens for new Socket-connections on a specified port.
    ConnectionAcceptor
    A ConnectionAcceptor listens to new incoming TCP-connections on the specified port until a new connection is available.
    PhoneConnectionAcceptor
    A PhoneConnectionAcceptor listens for new Socket-connections on a specified port.
    Server
    The main class of this Server.
    It implements the IConnectionControl interface, which means control of connections is maintained by another component, making this part of the server a trusted environment with the other component deciding which devices to allow connection.
